MEMBERSHIP.TITLE: Memberships
MEMBERSHIP.DIFFERENCE_DESC: Switch to premium and enjoy control of all your pots with relevant, updated and detailed information. Cancel anytime.
MEMBERSHIP.PREMIUM_ADVANTAGES: Everything from the free plan, plus:
MEMBERSHIP.FOOTER_DESC: Choose a Macetech plan and take care of your plants with smart monitoring, automatic watering and personalized alerts from your phone or computer. Enjoy care recommendations and easily adjust your preferences. Cancel or change plans anytime.

FAQ.CHANGE_PLAN_Q: Can I change plans at any time?
FAQ.CHANGE_PLAN_A: Yes, you can upgrade to Premium at any time. If you switch back to the free plan, the change will take effect at the end of your billing cycle.
FAQ.ANNUAL_BILLING_A: With annual billing, you pay for 12 months upfront and get a 17% discount compared to monthly payments.
FAQ.PAYMENT_METHODS_Q: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQ.PAYMENT_METHODS_A: We accept all major credit and debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) as well as PayPal.
FAQ.CANCEL_PREMIUM_Q: Can I cancel my Premium subscription?
FAQ.CANCEL_PREMIUM_A: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time from your account settings. You will still have access to Premium features until the end of your billing cycle.
